post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Senior Developer



  Liberty Registry Management Services manages the infrastructure tools and systems required to operate a leading edge global domain registry services. But it is our people that are key to Liberty's success in doing what we do. It' s the ideas, creativity and knowledge of our people that is the mainstay of Liberty's infrastructure.

We're looking for people to work with the Liberty Team, who want more than just a job. We're looking for people who willingly want to learn and to apply their knowledge and creativity with the kind of energy and spirit that makes up a winning team.

We are in current need of a Senior Developer as described below.


Title: Senior Developer

Position Reports to: Team Leader ?Development

Location: Toronto, Ontario

Salary: Commensurate with experience

Main Purpose of Position: To design and develop various tools and applications for the Liberty, RMS registry.


Major Activities of Position:
-design, code, test, document and make modifications to program or simple to medium complexity according to specifications
-maintain and provide ideas for enhancements to existing code
-prepare test data, conduct test verification and document test cases
-provide pager support on a rotational basis

Knowledge and Skill Requirements:
-5 or more years of application programming and development experience in Java, SQL, and Unix shell scripting.
-must be knowledgeable with any of the following Unix systems; Linux, Solaris, AIX, FreeBSD
-must have knowledge of relational databases such as PostgreSQL, Informix, Oracle, Sybase, MySQL.
-must have significant experience in at least one of:
-socket programming
-application layer protocol implementation
-JSP web development
-CGI web development
-XML parsing and publishing
-experience with Perl, C++ and/or C would be considered an asset
-experience in full development lifecycle
-experience in software design and implementation skills
-degree or diploma in Computer Science or equivalent

Interpersonal Skills:
-good problem solving, analytical and communication skills
-ability to learn new technologies quickly and readily adapt to changing requirements
-demonstrated ability to work effectively in a team based environment
-exceptionally efficient and thorough

Please forward your resume and cover letter to careers@libertyrms.info


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Employee  

Contact Information
careers@libertyrms.info
Liberty Registry Management Services
